attributes.action: MPs to consult their constituents with full Brexit facts before voting on bill
attributes.additional_details:
It goes without question that the Brexit campaign used a lot of falsehoods and 'alternative facts' many of which unravelled within hours of the result. I believe there are voters out there that given the clearer picture of a Brexit future may now feel differently on the matter. MPs should gauge this opinion before voting on the bill.
The referendum was presented with incomplete & poor information - constituents deserve a right to have their voices listened to, in what is a fresh opportunity
